attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All over the world children are suffering cruel and dangerous lives lots of the children are slaves. Children as young as 5 have to lead these lives for a bit of food and maybe a little bit of money!
There are many forms of slavery but some are more horrific then others. Here are some of the different types of slavery:
•      child prostitution(leading up to aids and other sexually transmitted deseases)
•      Beggars
•      Factories
•      Fishing(in dangerous waters)
And many more... 
But this not the children’s fault it may be their parents selling them for a bit of money to feed a family of 6 for 3 months, imagine your parent selling you for some money. 
Its basic human rights all the children want is to be free from the fear of danger free from those evil enough to keep them from living a happy and safe life.
Thank you for taking the time to read this.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
